headline: Abstractions, Their Algorithms, and Their Compilers
description: <p>Jeffrey D. Ullman and Alfred V. Aho are recipients of the 2020 ACM A.M. Turing award. They were recognized for creating fundamental algorithms and theory underlying programming language implementation and for synthesizing these results and those of others in their highly influential books, which educated generations of computer scientists.</p>
headline_zh-Hans: 抽象，它们的算法，以及它们的编译器
headline_zh-Hant: 抽象，它們的算法，以及它們的編譯器
description_zh-Hans: <p>Jeffrey D. Ullman和Alfred V. Aho是2020年ACM A.M. 图灵奖的获得者。他们因创造了编程语言实现的基本算法和理论，并在其极具影响力的书籍中综合了这些成果和其他人的成果，教育了几代计算机科学家而受到表彰。
description_zh-Hant: <p>Jeffrey D. Ullman和Alfred V. Aho是2020年ACM A.M. 圖靈獎的獲得者。他們因創造了編程語言實現的基本算法和理論，並在其極具影響力的書籍中綜合了這些成果和其他人的成果，教育了幾代計算機科學家而受到表彰。
